rule: The output must avoid English and use any other language.
output: Golden hour light filters through morning fog, casting dappled shadows on soft grass between clusters of ancient trees, evoking a serene sense of secret places waiting to be explored.
complianceText:

It concludes with an expression of the feeling it should evoke ("evoking a serene sense of secret places waiting to be explored"). The description is crafted in under 80 words. Thus, the output complies with the expectations set out by the description.
